languages.text: "За время своей службы сенешалем я слишком часто видел, как паломничество смелых обращалось катастрофой. Уверен, Лорд-капитан увидит еще не одно печальное зрелище подобное этому".
"I have seen brave pilgrimages end in calamity too many times to count during my service as Seneschal. I am sure this will not be the last sad spectacle the Lord Captain will witness."
languages.original_text: "За время своей службы сенешалем я слишком часто видел, как паломничество смелых обращалось катастрофой. Уверен, Лорд-капитан увидит еще не одно печальное зрелище подобное этому".

traits.locale_text: "I have seen brave pilgrimages end in calamity too many times to count during my service as Seneschal. I am sure this will not be the last sad spectacle the Lord Captain will witness."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have seen brave pilgrimages end in calamity too many times to count during my service as Seneschal. I am sure this will not be the last sad spectacle the Lord Captain will witness."

traits.locale_text: "I have seen brave pilgrimages end in calamity too many times to count during my service as Seneschal. I am sure this will not be the last sad spectacle the Lord Captain will witness."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “担任总领这些年来，我见过无数次勇敢的朝圣以殒灭告终。我相信，舰长大人今后还会再次目睹像这样的悲惨场面。”
languages.original_text: "I have seen brave pilgrimages end in calamity too many times to count during my service as Seneschal. I am sure this will not be the last sad spectacle the Lord Captain will witness."

traits.locale_text: “担任总领这些年来，我见过无数次勇敢的朝圣以殒灭告终。我相信，舰长大人今后还会再次目睹像这样的悲惨场面。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Depuis que je suis sénéchal, j'ai vu bien des pèlerinages finir en calamité. Ce ne sera probablement pas la dernière tragédie à laquelle {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} devra assister au cours de son règne. »
languages.original_text: "I have seen brave pilgrimages end in calamity too many times to count during my service as Seneschal. I am sure this will not be the last sad spectacle the Lord Captain will witness."

traits.locale_text: « Depuis que je suis sénéchal, j'ai vu bien des pèlerinages finir en calamité. Ce ne sera probablement pas la dernière tragédie à laquelle {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} devra assister au cours de son règne. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «He visto demasiados peregrinajes terminar en desastre como para llevar la cuenta durante mi servicio como Senescal. Me temo que no será la última tragedia que presencie {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "I have seen brave pilgrimages end in calamity too many times to count during my service as Seneschal. I am sure this will not be the last sad spectacle the Lord Captain will witness."

traits.locale_text: «He visto demasiados peregrinajes terminar en desastre como para llevar la cuenta durante mi servicio como Senescal. Me temo que no será la última tragedia que presencie {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「家令長を務める間、災厄に瀕しても勇敢な巡礼者を数えきれぬほど見てきました。ロード・キャプテンが目にする悲劇が今回限りということはまずありません」
languages.original_text: "I have seen brave pilgrimages end in calamity too many times to count during my service as Seneschal. I am sure this will not be the last sad spectacle the Lord Captain will witness."

traits.locale_text: 「家令長を務める間、災厄に瀕しても勇敢な巡礼者を数えきれぬほど見てきました。ロード・キャプテンが目にする悲劇が今回限りということはまずありません」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe während meiner Dienstjahre als Truchsess schon unzählige Male erlebt, wie mutige Pilgerfahrten in einer Katastrophe enden. Das wird gewiss nicht das letzte traurige Spektakel sein, das der Lord Captain erlebt."
languages.original_text: "I have seen brave pilgrimages end in calamity too many times to count during my service as Seneschal. I am sure this will not be the last sad spectacle the Lord Captain will witness."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe während meiner Dienstjahre als Truchsess schon unzählige Male erlebt, wie mutige Pilgerfahrten in einer Katastrophe enden. Das wird gewiss nicht das letzte traurige Spektakel sein, das der Lord Captain erlebt."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I have seen brave pilgrimages end in calamity too many times to count during my service as Seneschal. I am sure this will not be the last sad spectacle the Lord Captain will witness."

languages.text: "Seneşal olarak hizmet ettiğim sürede sayısız cesur hac yolculuğunun felaketle sonuçlandığını gördüm. Eminim ki bu, Lord Kaptan'ın tanıklık edeceği son üzücü manzara olmayacaktır."
languages.original_text: "I have seen brave pilgrimages end in calamity too many times to count during my service as Seneschal. I am sure this will not be the last sad spectacle the Lord Captain will witness."
